title: Mega Man II
content:
Mega Man II was released by Capcom in 1988. It continues the story from Mega Man I, which was released the previous year.

The game's format is pretty much the same as the first one, but with an added password system and eight robot masters instead of six. Mega Man II is the breakthrough title in the series and is widely considered one of the greatest video games of all time.

The Minibosses do a great medley of the songs from the OST. Check it out!
boss_weaknessses:
Boss Weaknesses

Robot Masters

  • Metal Man: Use Metal Blade or Mega-Buster
  • Bubble Man: Use Metal Blade
  • Heat Man: Use Bubble Lead
  • Wood Man: Use Atomic Fire
  • Air Man: Use Leaf Shield
  • Crash Man: Use Air Shooter
  • Flash Man: Use Metal Blade
  • Quick Man: Use Time Stopper

Fortress Guardians

  • Dragon: Use Quick Boomerang
  • Wall Robot: Use Bubble Lead
  • Guts Dozer: Use Quick Boomerang
  • Sentry: Use Crash Bomb
  • Wily Ship Phase 1: Use Atomic Fire
  • Wily Ship Phase 2: Use Crash Bomb
  • Wily Alien: Use Bubble Lead
